name: ecobalyse
description: Accélérer l'affichage environnemental de la filière textile française
author: Ecobalyse <contact@beta.gouv.fr>

scripts.build: npm run server:build && rm -rf dist && npm run build:init && parcel build index.html --public-url ./
scripts.build:init: ./bin/update-version.sh && mkdir -p dist && cp -r public/* dist/ && npm run db:build
scripts.db:build: ./bin/build-db && npm run db:check && npx elm-format --yes src/Static/Json.elm
scripts.lint:ruff:all: npm run lint:ruff:check && npm run lint:ruff:format
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:prettier:all && npm run lint:elm && npm run lint:ruff:all && npm run lint:openapi
scripts.fix:ruff:all: npm run fix:ruff:check && npm run fix:ruff:format
scripts.fix:all: npm run fix:elm-format . && npm run fix:ruff:all && npm run fix:prettier:all
scripts.format:json: npx prettier@3.0.3 --write . && uv run ruff check --select I --fix && uv run ruff format
scripts.server:build: npm run db:build && elm make src/Server.elm --optimize --output=server-app.js
scripts.server:dev: npm run server:build && nodemon server.js --config nodemon.json
scripts.server:debug: elm make src/Server.elm --output=server-app.js && nodemon server.js --config nodemon.json
scripts.start:backend:dev: uv run backend database upgrade --no-prompt && uv run backend run --reload -p 8002
scripts.start:dev: bin/check-db.sh && npm run build:init && concurrently -k -n "parcel,maildev,server,backend" -c "green,cyan,yellow" "npm run start:parcel" "maildev --hide-extensions STARTTLS -p 1025 -w 1081" "npm run server:dev" "npm run start:backend:dev"
scripts.test:backend: concurrently -k -s first -n "maildev,test" "maildev --hide-extensions STARTTLS -p 1025 -w 1081" "while ! lsof -i:1025; do sleep 1; done && uv run pytest"
scripts.test:client: NODE_ENV=test npm run db:build && npx elm-test
scripts.test:server: npm run server:build && NODE_ENV=test jest tests/json.spec.js tests/server.spec.js tests/json.test.js tests/rate-limiting.spec.js
scripts.test: npm run test:review && npm run test:client && npm run test:jslib && npm run test:backend && npm run test:server
